reviews.review: JUEGAZO es half-life como no va a ser bueno. La historia muy entretenida y muy buena jugabilidad. Lo malo esque no te cuentan casi nada de la historia pero por lo demás está muy bien para viciarse xd

Na první hru od Valve a z roku 1999 opravdu skvělý počin. Half-Life nastavil novou příčku ve střílečkách z první osoby. Legendární hra, kterou si určitě musíte zahrát.

[b]10/10[/b]
Mi infancia :'D

Una referencia en los shooters. Muy dinámico, con una historia sencilla, y ha envejecido muy bien para el tiempo que tiene. Lo único que no me ha gustado es que puedes guardar a cada momento, y eso le quita parte de la dificultad. Lo digo yo que  soy un manco y me lo he conseguido pasar en difícil.

Recomiendo la compra del título con el Half-Life Complete Pack, que suele estar a menos de 5 euros en las rebajas de Steam la saga completa ;)
Зашибись, не надоест даже спустя десятки прохождений, кому не во что играть, советую пройти хоть раз, учитывая смешную цену по скидкам.А еще она на телефон есть, но это уже вообще космос

Amazing game at the time. Hard as nails. Tough enemies and no hand holding on where to go next. They don't make them like this anymore. Three thumbs up.

Played on a modern pc with windows 10 and had no problems.

De uno de los mejores videojuegos de la historia y de los más importantes que ha habido: el mítico Half-Life, de Valve. Tan icónica su Lambda, tan icónica su palanca y sus escenarios y armas, que se hace inolvidable. Un mastodonte de juego imperdible...
Eskiler bilir.

Симулятор физика, вынужденного срочно проходить курс повышения квалификации. Легендарная игра, которая скоро будет справлять своё двадцатилетие. К чему нужен очередной слащавый обзор на игру, чье качество было проверено самым непредвзятым критиком - временем?

Не пройти эту игру все равно как не прочитать в свое время Властелина Колец. И не важно, что сюжет или графика кажутся до смешного простыми. Half-Life очаровывает своим геймплеем и атмосферой огромного научного комплекса, который успевает стать родным.

Так что нечего сидеть и думать, тем более Valve постоянно продает свои игры по феерическим скидкам!

Я Рациональный Шепард, и это моя любимая игра в Steam.
Как любимое дитя разработчика приятно дополненно. Текстуры улучшены и местами взяты из Blue Shift. Стоит добавить в библиотеку, как обновленное издание классической игры.

This is my first time playing this game and I can see why people like it. You have to figure out the levels and when you do you feel like a genius. The gameplay is good and even though the graphics didn't age well the fun factor is still there. It took me 15 hours to beat. Very challenging and the shooting is good so it's worth a purchase. I would have two save files when you play because I would get stuck from a game bug and I would have to exit and re enter to fix it.

I played through this a bit and recorded an hours worth of scrap footage. It is a fun game and after about 5 to 10 minutes you cannot really see how bad the graphics are, because they aren't that bad.

Half-Life che dire... è stato tra i primi giochi avuti per PS2 15 anni fa..., gameplay, storia, grafica, tutto straordinario, il suo avvento nel panorama videoludico sin dal suo debutto nel 1998 si presentò come un punto di non ritorno per quanto riguarda gli FPS, e pensare che ha rischiato anche di non vedere mai la luce...
Se riuscite a valutare un gioco basandosi non solo sulla grafica, ma su tutto quello da che ne è composto(anche il contorno eventualmente...), allora non vi resta che provarlo, altrimenti è meglio che vi affidiate alla sua versione modernizzata, Black Mesa.
Da giocare ovviamente anche le espansioni Opposing Force, Blue Shift e Decay(in rete presenti progetti di modernizzazione anche per questi) e, se una volta terminato tutto, anche Half-Life 2, anche i suoi 2 episodi, sarete rimasti spiazzati dal finale volendolo così continuare, beh, siete fortunati visto che da qualche mese è in sviluppo Project Borealis, ovvero Half-Life 3(o anche Half-Life 2 Episodio 3...)(in maniera non ufficiale), basato fedelmente sulla stessa trama rilasciata da Marc Laidlaw, lo sceneggiatore della serie in questione!
Gioco invecchiato male
This is an amazing game. Tense and action-packed, it's crazy that it was first released in 1998.

Half-Life es un viaje imprescindible para todo amante de los videojuegos.

Posee un poco de todo! Narrativa de primera mano *check*, lugares curiosos en un complejo científico *check*, arsenal de armas abierto a posibilidades del usuario *check*, plataformeo y secciones donde hay que comerse un poco el cerebro *check*, enemigos que representan peligro pero libertad para enfrentarse a ellos *check*, una aventura en la que de verdad tu como jugador haces el viaje del punto A al B sin recortes entre zona y zona *check* 

El complejo de Black Mesa y el personaje de Gordon Freeman resonará en tu cabeza una y otra vez porque esto es toda una experiencia.

Además, si ya viviste la aventura, este juego soporta docenas de mods gratuitos hechos por la comunidad, hay conversiones de arriba y abajo que pueden abarcar tanto experiencias multijugador con amigos como viajes como jugador solitario.

Легендарный Гордон Фриман и его история !

Half-Life is a pretty decent game. You are the silent protagonist, a theoretical physicist, Gordon Freeman. You are late to work at a lab facility called Black Mesa. And after an experiment gone wrong, you must escape the immense lab. From parkour, puzzle-solving, and of course, shooting down enemies - aliens and also military sent to cover up the incident.

The game in today's standards is kinda iffy, but I still had fun with it. The game can get tedious at the very end too. Though it does have its flaws, this game really changed the way fps games are made. It was ahead of its time when it was released. And from that, we got new games created from mods for Half life, and of coruse we got Steam.

I would give this game 6/10. It was pretty enjoyable, from the wide range of enemies, and weapons (alien weapons too), and the derpy npcs too. They were all good, and served their purpose. It was a bit too long for its own good, but it was still a great time. I recommend this game if you want to see one of the roots that changed the gaming industry, or if you just like fps games in general.
Finally finished this game, Imma give it 10 rice bowls out of 10 rice bowls.

[b] Half-Life [/b] is a perfect example of a timeless game. Its presentation while dated, still has undeniable style. Additionally the gameplay itself is just as timeles as the presentation and level design. While Xen does stand out as a bit of black spot on the rest of the game, everything else easily makes up for it. Without a doubt one of the greatest games of all time.

I never played the original Half-Life but Half-Life 2 is one of my favorite games of all time. HL2 was the first game I recieved on my very first gaming PC when I was 15. I finally went back to see how everything started and I had a great time even 19 years after the original release. I wish I would have played it back in 1998 but I still enjoyed the game. Highly recommend.
